introDialogue: Hello smithy, I'm looking to get something to help me with the trees on my farm
Hey! I need something to help in my next battle!
It's time for my kid to learn the blade, could you make something fit for him?
secondLine: Nothing too fancy, he's still small
payment: Hmm lets see, how far will this set me back?
preferred: Alright, I bet I can make this work
unpreferred: Ah, nah, I think I'll look elsewhere
Hmm, um, you can keep it
baddeal: *Sigh* alright, I'll take it, but man that's steep
You're clearing me out but, alright.
neutral: Fair deal, I'll take it. Here's the money
Acceptable, you got yourself a deal
gooddeal: Wow, yeah I'll do that, thanks
Great deal! I'll have to tell my boys about this place
Yeah sure, that's a great price yeah.
refusal: You're funny, what's your actual price?
I don't have that much money boss
Uh that's a little much dont you think?
